path: books/Category Theory For Programmers/12. Limits and Colimits/3

attr.a:
pullback/pushout would be a smallest superset/biggest subset of two intersecting set/neibhoring set.

initial/terminal object would be a set of all elements/empty set.
attr.q: Subsets of a given set form a category. A morphism in that category is defined to be an arrow connecting two sets if the first is the subset of the second. What is a pullback of two sets in such a category? Whatâ€™s a pushout? What are the initial and terminal objects?
